ComicInfo.Summary: Never give a sucker an even break. There's a sucker born every minute. What does this have to do with our next issue? You be the judge.

Look Who’s Working at… McDonald’s; The Real Demographics of Various TV Audiences Volume III; Where Do They Get Off…?; Mad’s Comprehensive 10-Step Guide to Success in the Highly Charged World of Illegal Ticket Scalping; A Mad Look at Men in Black II; A Mad Peek Behind the Scenes on the Set of The Sopranos; Monroe and… PlayStation 2; Early Signs You May Have Picked a Bad Religion; Why is George W.
